name: Presentation / Pitch Deck
description: Just a simple, free presentation that is slimmed down to have the key elements you'll need to get started and a simple enough design that you can get creative. You can use it for a pitch deck. It has a few components that let you update the pop of color and the brand easily. I'm not sure that the figma community needs yet another presentation template but I had fun writing the silly placeholder text and maybe this will save you some clicks. Good luck on your presentation!
